id.description: Unique identifier for the conversation thread

groupId.description: Unique identifier for the group associated with the conversation

topic.description: Topic or subject of the conversation thread

hasAttachments.description: Flag indicating if the conversation has attachments

lastDeliveredDateTime.description: Date and time when the last message was delivered

uniqueSenders.description: Array of unique senders involved in the conversation thread

preview.description: Preview text of the conversation thread content

isLocked.description: Flag indicating if the conversation thread is locked
